about_me.title: About Me
about_me.description: DevOps/Platform engineer with over 10 years of experience in building and supporting infrastructures. Specializing in process automation, creating reproducible environments and implementing transparent delivery pipelines. I value reliability, predictability and metrics that help teams move faster and safer.

skills.title: Skills and Experience
skills.description: of experience in supporting IT infrastructures on various projects. Skills in web servers, networks, monitoring, email, virtualization, databases, containerization.

skills.containers: Containers & Orchestration: Docker, Docker Compose, Kubernetes (basic)
skills.cicd: CI/CD: Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions
skills.networking: Networking & Infrastructure: DHCP, DNS, TCP/IP, FTP, RDP, OpenVPN, PPTP, Ethernet, NAT, IPSec, Mikrotik
skills.cloud_platforms: Cloud Platforms: Google Cloud Platform, AWS, Yandex Cloud, Hetzner
skills.automation: Automation & Scripting: Ansible, Bash, Python scripting
skills.monitoring: Monitoring & Observability: Zabbix, Prometheus, Grafana, Alertmanager, Loki
skills.business_systems: Business & Enterprise Systems: 1C, 1C Cluster, Active Directory (AD), Email Servers
